The augmented dataset is generated by extracting knowledge from the wikidata knowledge base." description: "Training a transformer language model with an augmented dataset. The augmented dataset is generated by extracting knowledge from the wikidata knowledge base." nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---

{% endraw %}

Acronym

K - knowledge

I -

R

B - base

y - descriptive

It's a KBy Transformer (pronounced Kirby)

How to use

Query the knowledge base.

{% raw %} 
kba = KnowledgeBaseAccessor()
kba.query('a < c')

'Performing query a < c'
{% endraw %}

Setup

Run ./bin/download_data to download data in project directory
